Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Bollywood Dance
Episodes.Plot: Sarah and Meera are practicing a traditional Indian dance for the school assembly, but Meera's sari has not arrived.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Stolen Strawberries
Episodes.Plot: Pat visits Dorothy who tells him that all her strawberries have gone missing; Pat saves the day, with a little help from PC Selby and his banjo.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Pot of Gold
Episodes.Plot: Pat and the other parents decide to brighten up the school by painting a rainbow on the playground wall; Meera teaches them a special song to remember the colors of the rainbow.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Greendale Knights
Episodes.Plot: Pat builds a castle out of boxes for the children to play in.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Fantastic Feast
Episodes.Plot: A famous chef disappoints the residents of Greendale by not being able to visit, but Pat is able to organize a great day.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat Gets Stuck
Episodes.Plot: When Pat gets stuck in a tree after following Jess, the special dog whistle he forgot to give to Mrs. Goggins is his only hope for rescue.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Incredible Inventions
Episodes.Plot: Ted has some visitors to stay when Postman Pat's house floods.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Go-Kart Race
Episodes.Plot: The residents of Greendale learn that cheaters never prosper.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pats Pet Rescue
Episodes.Plot: Jess gets into a tricky situation and needs Amy's help to get him out of it.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Pony Post
Episodes.Plot: Julian, Meera and Sarah are having a riding lesson on Pumpkin, and Pat confesses that he's a bit nervous of horses; when Pumpkin runs away, Pat has to overcome his fear and ride Pumpkin back to Amy's house.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Clifftop Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Alf moves the sheep to a higher pasture, but Bessie (Bill's pet sheep) gets out and is discovered stuck on a ledge of a cliff; Pat has to overcome his fear of heights to arrange a daring rescue.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Lost Property
Episodes.Plot: Meera and Julian decide to set up a lost property office and find all sorts of "lost property" outside people's houses.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Talking Cat
Episodes.Plot: Julian and Charlie attach a walkie-talkie to Jess' collar so people believe that Jess can talk.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Hedgehog Hideaway
Episodes.Plot: Mrs Goggins finds a hedgehog in the garden behind the post office.
